official_title: A bill to repeal title III, Marine Sanctuaries, of the Marine Protection Research and Sanctuaries Act.

summary.text: Repeals title III (Marine Sanctuaries) of the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972. Redesignates such Act as the Marine Protection and Research Act of 1972.

titles.title: A bill to repeal title III, Marine Sanctuaries, of the Marine Protection Research and Sanctuaries Act.
